name: Dim Spirits
description:
~ About the game ~

Dim Spirits is an open-world survival game with a map which is 100m2.  Scavenge the map for ammo and weapons while surviving the apocalypse. There are 5 different guns: Pistol, Rifle, Shotgun, Long Rifle, and a minigun. There are 3 different ammo types: Small, Medium and Heavy.  Different weapons use different ammo types and have a different weight. There are 6 difficulties. There are 3 different places to explore: Roguefield, Basinfort and Deepwood.

~ Story ~

It is the year 2469, humans are an endangered species thanks to rebellious robots. But, amidst the chaos, a likely savior rises... which is you. 

~ Controls ~

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Mouse to aim and shoot

E to interact

Shift to run.

~ Credits ~

Art, music, and scripts made by me.

font is medievalSharp.
